TopicTitle: Where to download the 64 bits version of Kerbal ?

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone.

I downloaded Kerbal Space Program (and bought it) last year.

Now I have multiple people tell me the 64bit version exists. Some mention a KSP_64x.exe or KSP_x64.exe file that I have to run instead... The problem is that there is no such files on my entire computer at the moment.

I tried going to kerbalspaceprogram.com website, nothing

Did a google search, nothing beside mention of that 64bit file, but no link to download anywhere.

This is killing me now. Where does one download the 64 bits (having already bought the game) ?

Thank you for any answers.

Edited September 11, 2014 by Francois424

From KSP store.

I'm not a steam user. Perhaps other could help.
I'm a Steam user, and when I got mine it had the x64 exe packaged with KSP. Just look for it in your directory folder.
